JOB DESCRIPTION: Minimum 3 to 4 years experience in Developing .Net web applications Build applications using .Net 4.0 or above in C#/ ASP.NET MVC/  Java script /  JQuery / CSS /  HTML /  AJAX/  Subversion /  Visual Studio Should have strong experience in JavaScript /  JQuery /  CSS /  HTML Should have experience in ASP.NET MVC,  SQL Server,  WCF /  Web API,  Bootstrap,  LINQ,  XML Must have strong Web UI knowledge and best practice skills Experience developing applications using SOA Concepts,  WCF Integration,  LINQ Integration,  ADO.net integration Working knowledge on XML Data Sources and XML Processing Should be strong in Object Oriented Programming concepts Should be strong in SQL Server and Store procedures. Ability to adapt quickly to an existing,  complex environment Ability to understand business requirement and convert them to applications Ability to perform both as an individual and in a team and completing the given tasks on time
